data.title: 2012 DVD John Cusack - Danny Glover with Special Features New Sealed
data.meta_description:
This DVD features the 2009 blockbuster hit "2012" starring John Cusack and Danny Glover. The movie is a thrilling disaster film that will keep you on the edge of your seat. The DVD is brand new and still sealed, ensuring that you will receive a high-quality product with all of the special features included.


The DVD edition year is 2009 and it is in widescreen format with a region code of DVD: 1 (US, Canada...). This DVD is perfect for movie lovers or collectors who enjoy adding great titles to their collection.
